text: Ryan Benjamin Tedder (born June 26, 1979) is an American singer, and Grammy nominated songwriter and record producer born in Tulsa, Oklahoma. He has written and produced for various musicians but, as of 2007, he is best known as the front man for the "MySpace US rock phenomenon", OneRepublic. He wrote songs and produced for Britney Spears, Christina Aguilera and also, did some work for Timbaland. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Ryan Tedder For the Sound *The official site of OneRepublic Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American pianists Category:American guitarists Category:Singers from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:Musicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma Category:OneRepublic
title: Ryan Tedder
